item.title: UN human rights chief says US strikes on alleged drug boats are 'unacceptable'
item.description: The U.N. human rights chief says U.S. military strikes on vessels allegedly carrying illegal drugs from South America are unacceptable and must stop

item.title: US Marine accused of kidnapping girl with intent to sexually assault her, FBI says
item.description: The FBI has arrested an active-duty U.S. Marine it accused of kidnapping a 12-year-old girl in Indiana with the intent of sexually assaulting her

item.title: 2 die in flooded New York City basements during heavy rainstorm
item.description: Authorities say two people died in flooded New York City basements as record rain fell in New York City
